boardgame.name: Kardboard Kings: Card Shop Simulator
boardgame.description:
Open your own Card shop by the seaside! Buy, trade and sell Cards, OR keep them for your own collection! Earn reputation with customers, beat your shop goals, unlock new decorations, and host exciting events to bring everyone to the best Card shop in town!

You are Harry Hsu, a young man who recently inherited a card shop from his father, a former champion of the famous card game “Warlock.” With the shop’s reputation on the line, you start working behind the counter, juggling the locals’ requests while trying to familiarize yourself with owning a shop.

Your guide, Giuseppe, a fast-talking Cockatoo, helps you in your buying and selling journey – securing cards of various rarities to top collectors or helping an enthusiastic customer from the neighbourhood.

KEY FEATURES:
Buy, Sell, or Flex – Buy low, sell high, or just add Cards to your showcase for all to see!

Collect Over 100 Unique Cards – From ripping open booster packs, to buying singles, you’ll uncover dozens of vibey Cards featuring illustrations from stacks of talented artists! (Plus their rare, shiny variants!)

Master An Ever-Changing Market – Reprints, rumours, rule changes, kids’ meal promos, thieves, and church condemnations (the usual suspects) will all affect the price of your treasured cards. Think fast!

Win the Hearts of Customers – Befriend regulars by tracking down their requests, help build their decks, and become a part of a sleepy seaside town! Or just rip them off and feel their wrath!

Build The Perfect Shop – New management means new branding – create your dream shop with a catalogue of walls, flooring, furniture, and knickknacks; everyone loves a good chia pet, right?

Solve The Mystery – All is not what it seems on the seaside! The appearance of a mysterious masked thief leaves locals wondering who to trust with their precious Cards! Who is this shadowy character? And just what are the Legendary Cards?

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: An Age Contrived
boardgame.description:
An Age Contrived is a fantasy euro game of engine building and flexible programming. You play as a god in the Eldranic pantheon, where you are only as powerful as the mortals of this unstable world believe you are. Your goal is to establish yourself as the pantheon's prevailing god by securing mortal belief, as you advance the mortal realm from its age of darkness into civilization.

Each player receives a character board and a transmutation device, which they use to channel their energy into the mortal realm. Energy is how a god exerts its will, and is used to construct monuments, claim new tiles, and accomplish feats. Bind your energy for end-game scoring, and unlock new energy to replenish your reserves. The game ends when the last monument is complete, at which point the player with the most points wins.

There are two types of turns, with no rounds or phases. On a player's turn, they must either charge their transmutation device and program it openly, or use its energy to take as many actions as they have already programmed. Information is open, and the only luck is in the shuffling of tiles to set up the game. Player choices determine how the game unfolds.

The game features unlockable unique player powers, a board that players construct differently each game, and 5 ways to build your engine. You will be encouraged to plan ahead, but required to adapt your strategy in order to come away victorious.

boardgame.name: Digital Map Bundle: Season 1 (Tyranny of Dragons)
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

I've gone back and reaccomplished and rescanned the maps used in the Season 1 Expeditions adventures!

If you run online, like to print your maps, or just want to have something nice to frame and hang over your fireplace to impress your friends, then give these a shot. Included are two zip files—each containing 23 maps in both .jpg (reasonably-sized for online play) and .pdf (scaled for printing 1" scale battlemaps) formats.

boardgame.name: AD&D Scenario BSK 1988
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Årets AD&D turnering genomföres utan finalomgång och tar med spelarna på ett äventyr där kvickhet i tanke är viktigare än kraft bakom slagen.

User summary:

This scenario was run as a tournament at Borås Spelkonvent 6: Nulli Secundus (1988) and published as a scanned document in 2020. It is released as two PDF files:

14-page scenario
9-page print-and-play pre-generated characters


It appears that the scenario was not titled beyond "AD&D Scenario" - the appended "BSK 1988" was added upon publication in 2020.

boardgame.name: Individuella AD&D - Turneringen, GothCon XII
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

En turnering som bygger på deltagarnas individuella prestationer i rollspel. Egenskaper som engagemang, samarbetsförmåga och målmedvetenhet ställs på prov. Sex stycken för varandra obekanta spelarfigurer samlas för att tillsammans lösa en uppgift och övervinna svårigheter i form av monster, fällor, fiender med lömska planer, och inte minst personliga svagheter.

Scenariorna utspelar sig i en annan tid, där magi och mirakel är en del av verkligheten, och världen terroriseras av i sanningen fruktansvärda monster. I denna värld finns det två större människoriken som varit i krig med varandra så länge legenderna kan minnas. Strider har stått såväl i maktens boningar som på slagfälten, och alltjämt är det fältherrar och diplomater som har makten. I denna händelserika omgivning har spelarfigurerna sin tillvaro, äventyrare utan fast punkt och med ett brinnande intresse för ovanliga företeelser och spännande utmaningar.

Turneringen går i tre etapper: kvalificeringsomgång, semifinal och final. Till semifinalen skall 36 personer kvalificera sig, och av dessa skall sex personer utmärka sig och gå till finalen. Bedömningen sker på grunder av de andra spelarnas åsikter och i viss mån spelledarens uppfattning. En detaljerad beskrivning av bedömningen kommer att fås i samband med anmälningsbekräftelsen .

Spelare skall vara bekanta med AD&D-spelet. Material kommer att användas både ur Players Handbook och Unearthed Arcana, men modifieringar kommer att göras i den utsträckning det befinnes nödvändigt.

User summary:

This scenario was run as a tournament at GothCon XII (1988)
and published as a scanned document in 2020. It is released as four PDF files:

4-page Background
23-page "Part 1": Det var väl ingen konst
26-page "Part 2": Goda råd är dyra
24-page "Part 3": Väktaren i ravinen


While the three tournament rounds had titles, the entire scenario apparently was known only as the AD&D Individuella. The indicated title, here, was established upon publication in 2020.

boardgame.name: Finaläventyr
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Det är morgon och en ny dag gryr. Resan har varit lugn hittills, lite förvånansvärt för en stäpp känd för sina monster. Celric, Elfvina, Pilfer och Belgrath slipper i alla fall bry sig om att läsa in nya formler eftersom de inte har kastat några pâ ett tag nu.

User summary:

This scenario was run as a tournament at LinCon (1985) and published as a scanned document in 2020. It is released as three PDF files:

41-page Scenario
11-page Pre-generated, print-and-play characters
9-page Print-and-play handouts


The title appears to have been specified at the 2020 publication.

boardgame.name: AD&D Nostalgica
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

"Fem nötter och en sliten hammare, tio fötter i en liten karnmare"
- "Vad kan det där betyda", muttrade Boltrax dvärgkrigaren?
- "Ja, och vad gör den där stora skuggan i taket", undrade Lothringar halvalvsjägaren. Ingen av dem med någon större intelligens (8 respektive 11).
- "Äh, strunt i det", sade Svintomax magikern.
- "Låt oss nu slå mot Wisdom så får vi reda på vad ramsan betyder. Det finns fortfarande guld och XP i massor att hämta längre ner." Hillbilly Buttercup, tjuven, och Dordinar, prdsten, nickade instämmande.

(Olyckligvis för spelarna var det lönlöst. Den sadistiskt skojfriska spelledaren var så nöjd med sin fälla att spelarna snart skulle "bakom-skärmen-dö") Undvik att gå samma öde till mötes genom att kunna regel- och monsterböckerna bättre. Och du - övningsspela mer Gygax.

User summary:

This scenario first was run as a tournament at SydCon '95 (1995) and published as a scanned document in 2021. It is released as three PDF files:

22-page Scenario
3-page Print-and-play monsters
6-page Print-and-play handouts

boardgame.name: Spellbook
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

In this solo journaling game, you will create a sentient Spellbook that passes from Witch to Witch, growing and changing as it does. With the help of accompanying tables, you will compose Spells and describe the Witches and Coven who come into possession of the book over time, detailing their shared history. As with any solo journaling game, this is meant to be a guide for your creativity, so feel free to use or ignore the rules as you please over the course of play.

boardgame.name: Sovereign Slayer Solitaire
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

Sovereign Slayer Solitaire is a one player one pamphlet card game.

You will need a standard 54 cards deck, a 20-sided die, a red pawn and a black pawn to play.

boardgame.name: Submerged
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

SUBMERGED is a solo journalling game of undersea exploration.

In this game, you take on the role of a daring explorer aboard a submersible. You have been charged with venturing into the depths of the ocean, to find something wondrous and undiscovered, hidden deep below the waves.

boardgame.name: Les 4 Pandastiques
boardgame.description:
A long time ago, 4 extraordinary creatures lived among us: the pandastics 4!
But one day, to protect the 3 others, the 4th creature disappeared... Many adventurers went in search of it and it is said that to make it reappear, you must accomplish quests engraved in the ruins of an ancient temple...
During your adventure, it is up to you to be the most observant, attentive and clever to succeed in these legendary quests!
At the end of the road, you may discover this mythical creature that is just waiting to reappear: the Pand4stic!

Complete quests to solve the mystery of the Pandastic 4:
Turn your cards over wisely, using your memory to combine the characteristics of your cards!
But stop in time so you don't lose everything and score more points than your opponents!

Memory, risk-taking and daring will be essential for you to become the best adventurer and discover the Pand4stic!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Tall Tales & Alien Skies
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

You are a traveller in a weird and wonderful (and discomfiting and slightly uncomfortable world) - and you have a odd and uncanny tale to tell (whether it be a scathingly bad review of a tour or an unfortunate brush with the numinous).

In the scramble for something (anything!) to jot down your experiences, you find the good old 45c postcard. Perhaps you are just saving this to write up properly later or maybe you feel the folks at home will offer more sympathy for your travails, either way this little piece of card with a cute scenery photo on it is your medium.

Tall Tales & Alien Skies is a journaling rpg that is intended for solo play but can be played in small-group format (where everyone chips in to answer the questions with as zany an answer as they prefer).

boardgame.name: Lustige Reise
boardgame.description:
The players take turns rolling a die and start their meeples at space 1. The first to reach space 50 wins the game. On some spaces events hinder or benefit the players.

Published in the hardcover annual "Das Kränzchen" No. 26

boardgame.name: The Box
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

This is a game about a box.
Maybe...
Sort of...

The Box is a single-player journaling experience about a box that only exists in your mind. This box, like most other boxes, has another object hidden within it.

During the game, you and your stream of consciousness will shape both the box and the object inside it, working out what they are, where they came from, and how you feel about them.

Eventually, you will be faced with a choice.

Will you open the box and find out what it holds? Or will you slip it back into storage with its seal intact?

boardgame.name: The City Stretches Out In All Directions Without Limits
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

The City Stretches Out is a solo game about imagining infinite and fantastic cities from the perspective of a person driving whatever that city's equivalent of a subway train is.
boardgame.rpg: The City Stretches Out In All Directions Without Limits

boardgame.name: The Cthulucene Collectors
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

When there are no more mass production facilities and new technology is rare if ever available, the world learns to save, repair, and repurpose existing gadgets in order to keep things going. With one crucial piece of of the puzzle knocked out of place, the world changed and now a new way of life has taken shape. Players take on the role of collectors. Collectors travel from place to place collecting random parts they need for their community. There's only so much daylight so you'd better keep moving.

Experience a world not unlike our own, but different in that humanity came together to make peace with itself, with the earth, and with the inevitability of finite resources coming to an end.

boardgame.name: The Land and the People
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

160 years ago, a man completed a life-long project and published his first great map of his country. Today it is celebrated as a great achievement, but we don't know much about him as a person outside of legends. What was his journey like?

In this GM-less game based on the Carta SRD game engine, you take the role of a cartographer and their team exploring a fictional country. It has been your lifelong dream to make a detailed and accurate map for the people. In the process, you will find out about your country, the people who live there, and more about yourself then you ever thought possible.

boardgame.name: Betwixt and Between: Forces of Nature
boardgame.description:
So, you’ve decided to return… and this time you come.. somewhat prepared. With artifacts lending you powers... But there’s also new challenges ahead. Traces of faery dust around the land, and new places rearranging the world… Whirlwinds, sacred trees, moon paths... and not to forget, new powerful master spells to learn.... Are you sure you’re ready?

The Forces of Nature expansion for Betwixt and Between includes new powerful artifacts giving each Mystic a magic boost at the start of the game and a special ability to use throughout the game.

The expansion also includes more Exploration Cards with new adventurous places to visit with new actions for your Mystic to put to use to create epic turns!

There are also new challenging master spells to learn for big amount of points, rewarding being smart and creative when building your Magic Weave. 

Our Mystics will also find magical Faery Dust sprinkled around the game board, presenting a brand new resource to collect and score points from in different ways! 

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: The Last Magus
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

You are the Last Magus, out of your tower, witnessing the world you once knew crumble, fall to pieces...

The shadows grow long, and in these final days of this Age of Magic, you sense a familiar presence beckoning you from the shadows, calling you to rest.

It is Death. It is patient.

Your work is not yet done. This is the world that you loved for all your long life, filled with marvelous places and the most precious of people. Uncertainty reigns. You can bring order to the world, even as your magic dwindles. This chaos strikes like birthing pains, so you must deliver the world into another Age, one where you will be absent and they will live on, remembering.


In The Last Magus you take on the role of a powerful sorcerer of your own creation, with your own past and motivations. Travel through the provinces of the Empire, and in each province uncover a crisis waiting for your intervention. Control the weather, summon demons, create elaborate illusions, or boil the blood in your enemies' veins. Restore peace using sorcery, limited only by your imagination, or bring order with more worldly, diplomatic means.

And yet your time is ending, Magus. Another force stalks these roads. It is Death, who you will meet in many guises, and with whom you will bargain for time. So little time...

boardgame.name: Black Stories Junior: Pferde Stories
boardgame.description:
The successful mystery series "Black Stories" is also available in the "scary-free" version - for families with children from 8 years old. Instead of dark and scary it gets colorful and funny at the "Black Stories Junior".

Black Stories Junior: horse stories includes fifty cards with riddles for you to puzzle out.

In these horse-powered riddles about fake coat colours, spooky ghost horses, exploding dung heaps, botched riding holidays or ponies in mortal danger, you have to combine things smartly and think cleverly around corners to uncover their secrets.

boardgame.name: Black Stories Junior: Unbelievable Stories
boardgame.description:
The successful mystery series "Black Stories" is also available in the "scary-free" version - for families with children from 8 years old. Instead of dark and scary it gets colorful and funny at the "Black Stories Junior".

Black Stories Junior: unbelievable stories are tricky riddles for animal lovers. The players try to reconstruct the stories by asking, guessing and fiddling about.

In these incredible strategy stories about life-saving monster waves, dried-up waterfalls, flying children, monkeys with foreign language skills and budgies with their own phone number things are always a little strange. Only those who ask, puzzle and guess, to uncover these really true secrets.

Black Stories Junior: unbelievable stories includes fifty cards with riddles for you to puzzle out.

boardgame.name: Fischers Fritz
boardgame.description:
Tongue twisters are a real challenge - and quite funny for the listeners. The faster you speak these sentences, the greater the possibility of slurring your words.

How to play:

You pick a card and repeat the tongue twister three times.
Does it work without mistakes? You get to keep the card.
Does it not work? The next person tries to repeat the tongue twister three times.
The person who has collected the most cards wins.

boardgame.name: Chachapoya (Second Edition)
boardgame.description:
South-America, 1930. The world’s most famous archeologists formed a secret alliance and searched through the whole continent for the most valuable treasures.
It was a success, they collected the artifacts of the Chachapoya indians, blessed and cursed as well.
But when it came to distribute the booty, they couldn’t agree, so with cunning and bluffing they tried to outsmart each other.
Who will take home the most valuable treasures? The toughest, the strongest or the smartest?
Everything depends on timing and the right artifact, because grasp all loose all…it’s easy to leave one’s boots there because of greed.
To make things worse, some uninvited guests (The Triad, and the Secret Service) checked in.

The starting player chooses 3 treasure cards, shows them to the other players, throws away 1 secretly and puts down 1 face down and 1 face up.

The players start bidding on these treasure cards and the winner takes both. Players must bid with coins and adventurer cards of the same value - but variable number of cards - and at the end of the round all players get only 1 adventurer card.

If someone collects too much treasure card of the same kind, he/she is eliminated from the game.

The player with the highest score (who is not eliminated) wins the game.

The Changes in the Second edition:

More Leader and Adventurer cards
New Treasure Cards
Board for the drawing deck and discard pile
Coins for bidding and buying tokens
25 Endbonus Tokens added for more strategy
New bidding rules and more interaction with other players
Slightly changed basic rules
More replayability, and challenges and fun!
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Chachapoya: SNAKE Adventurer Promo Cards II

boardgame.name: Fortune Princess and the Knights of Fortune in the Kingdom of Temirana
テミラーナ国の強運姫と悲運騎士団
boardgame.description: Visual Novel

boardgame.name: IT Startup: Office Lockdown
boardgame.description: IT Startup - Office Lockdown is a stand-alone expansion to "IT Startup - The Card Game". It contains 50% more components than the older "IT Startup - The Card Game" base game from 2020. It is playable for 1-6 players (standard game mode with a shared deck), with additional 2 vs 2, custom deck, solo and tournament modes. Aside from being a stand-alone game it can also be combined with previous game editions.

boardgame.name: Nak Makan Apa
boardgame.description:
What’s the hardest question for a group to answer when they’re out? Nak makan apa? - “What do you want to eat?”

Nak Makan Apa is a bilingual (Bahasa Melayu and English) card game, where you take it in turns to play flavours you want to eat, with the aim of finding a meal that matches the collective taste.

There’s also a bit of take that as you can play ‘songeh’ cards to frustrate the other players and cancel some of their meals.

First to make four meals wins.

boardgame.name: Catch the Wave
boardgame.description:
It had to end eventually! Humanity has finally become extinct. Just the Tanuki survived.

These legendary Japanese creates have all the random leftover stuff from people in the bin and have only picked up a few memorabilia. The hottest boards in the world! They surf as much as possible. Infinite space, free beaches and the big surf battle every weekend, when the waves hit first and then glow. Everyone catches a huge wave here. Which brings us to the topic. This game is like life. In the end, the one who gets their shit together wins. Get as many cards as possible in the correct sequence resulting in the longest wave — and on it the winner surfs away.

—description from the rulebook

Each turn, players draw a card with a value from one to twenty from the central pile of cards. Then, they add it their own row of cards. The goal is to arrange your cards in ascending order, but after you've placed a card in your row, it is turned face-down, and you'll need to remember where you put each card.

The game ends when the pile of cards runs out. The player that has created the longest sequence of ascending cards wins the game.

—user summary

listing.notes:
Spieleranzahl: 1 bis 4 Spieldauer: 15 Minuten Altersempfehlung: 8+
CATCH THE WAVE - Memospiel Es musste so kommen! Die Menschheit hat sich endgültig die Puste abgedreht. Nur die Tanuki habens überlebt. Die japanischen Urviecher haben sämtliche Schwachsinnsreste der Menschen in die Tonne gekloppt und nur ein paar Erinnerungsstücke aufgehoben. Und zwar die geilsten Boards der Welt! Darauf surfen sie nun, was das Zeug hält. Unendlich viel Platz, freie Strände und jedes Wochenende der große Surfbattle, bei dem die Wogen erst hochschlagen und dann glühen. Jeder macht hier eine Riesenwelle. Womit wir beim Thema sind. Dieses Kartenmemo-Spiel ist wie das Leben. Am Ende gewinnt der, der was auf die Reihe kriegt. Möglichst viele Karten in der korrekten Folge ergeben die längste Welle. Und auf der surft der Sieger davon.
Inhalt: 88 Spielkarten 12 Haifischflossen Limitierter Hai-Anhänger Spielanleitung (Deutsch und Englisch) 3 nur für dieses Spiel limitierte Sticker 1 handsignierte Postkarte
Besonderheiten: Limitierte Sonderauflage von 999 Spielen, händisch durchnummeriert 3 exklusive Sticker und eine vom Autor und Illustrator handsignierte Karte Verpackung aus 100% biologisch abbaubaren Karton Für den Druck werden nur umweltfreundliche und wasserbasierte Farben ohne Chemie verwendet. Kannste also auch drauf rumkauen. Spielkarten aus Kraftpapier Made in Germany / Hergestellt in Deutschland
Mit Spielregeln in folgenden Sprachen: DE, EN

boardgame.name: Honey
boardgame.description:
Honey is a game of bag building we hope will get you buzzing! Players work simultaneously on their own player sheets using roles dice results to fill in abilities as well as gain knowledge about flowers.

Beekeepers set up gardens to produce certain blends of Honey and now you will too! Knowing your flowers, then getting the bees to produce the most expensive jars will be among your tasks. Additionally, every five rounds players will choose a scoring option from a bonus card! Maximize your resources, rolls, and get ready for bag building with dice!

Players complete 25 total rounds and at game end will score points for completed flowers in rows and columns as well as scoring bonuses for Honey and bonus abilities. The winner will have earned the most points from their in-game and final scoring!

Honey plays 1-100 players. Roll and write your way through the tulips as you gain knowledge of blooms to grow your apiary and bee the best you can bee!

boardgame.name: Blood Coven
boardgame.description:
Blood Coven is a microgame for 2-3 players, in which players are vampires competing to create a coven of vampies and a herd of victims to feed on. Blood coven features mechanics from the vampire game from Cults & Covens.

This is a microgame that uses pocket change as pieces. 10 pennies, 6 nickels. and 6 dimes. Coins in supply and city(play area) are "villagers". Coins in a players hand or fatigue area are "victims" and coins on turn order slots on the player card are "vampires'.

Each round is divided into 3 phases (feed, action, refresh). Players use pieces from their hands (victims) to feed any hungry vampires on their player cards and take actions. If any hungry vampires are not fed, they die. The game ends when there are no villagers left in the village or supply area.

The player with the most victory points wins. Players receive 1vp per victim in their possession. Vampires are worth 3vp for penny vampires, 4vp for nickel vampires, 5vp for dime vampires.

Blood Coven, WereKittens, and Eldritch Cults are 3 completely different microgames in the world of Cults & Covens. Each game can be played by itself or the games can be mixed so that players can play vampire against cat or even cat and vampire against a god from Eldritch Cults.

boardgame.name: WereKittens
boardgame.description:
WereKittens is a microgame for 2-3 players, in which players are wereKittens competing to eat villagers and convert villagers into a powerful team of wereKittens. WereKittens features mechanics from the werecat game from Cults & Covens.

This is a microgame that uses pocket change as pieces. 10 pennies, 6 nickels. and 6 dimes.

Each round is divided into 3 phases (place victims, action, refresh)

phase 1 place victims: players place victims from their hand into their feed and/or scare areas if they want to feed them to cats this turn.

phase 2 Action: During this phase, each werecat takes its action in order.(each werecat has its own turn order/initiative number). players each begin with 1 werecat and create more as the game progresses. On its turn, a werecat may either, take a villager from the village as a victim or turn one of the villagers in the village into a werecat.

In this game, penny werecats have the most strength but are expensive to make and are not worth many points. dime werecats are weak, but are cheap to make and worth a lot of points. nickels are in the middle.

The game ends when there are no villagers left in the village or supply area.

The player with the most victory points wins. werecats are worth 2vp for penny werecats, 3vp for nickel werecats, 4vp for dime werecats.
victims are worth 2 vp for the victim type you have the most of, 1vp for the type you have second most of, and 0 for the type you have least of.

Blood Coven, WereKittens, and Eldritch Cults are 3 completely different microgames in the world of Cults & Covens. Each game can be played by itself or the games can be mixed so that players can play vampire against cat, or even cat and vampire against a god from Eldritch Cults.
Components: (12 cards, 1 rulesheet)

The player with the most victory points wins. .

Blood Coven, WereKittens, and Eldritch Cults are 3 completely different microgames in the world of Cults & Covens. Each game can be played by itself or the games can be mixed so that players can play vampire against cat or 2 vampires against a god from Eldritch Cults.

boardgame.name: Eldritch Cults
boardgame.description:
Eldritch Cults is a microgame for 2-3 players, in which players are weird and Lovecraftian gods who are competing to lure villagers into their cults. this game features mechanics from the cult game Cults & Covens.

This is a microgame that uses pocket change as pieces. 10 pennies, 6 nickels. and 6 dimes. Coins in supply and the city (play area) are "villagers". Coins that are tails up or in the fatigue area are cultists, heads-up coins are priests.

Each round is divided into 3 phases (place cultists, action, fatigue).
In phase 1, players place cultists on temples to enable actions.

in phase 2, temples can take actions. Temples, on their turn can either turn a villager into a cultist or a priest.

in phase 3, players take back any cultists that were fatigued on the previous turn, then move any cultists they used this turn into the fatigue area.

Game ends when there are no coins left in the supply area or village.

The player with the most victory points wins. Players receive 1vp per cultist in their possession. Priests are worth 4vp for penny priests, 5vp for nickel priests, 6vp for dime priests.

Blood Coven, WereKittens, and Eldritch Cults are 3 completely different microgames in the world of Cults & Covens. Each game can be played by itself or the games can be mixed so that players can play vampire against cat, or 2 vampires, or 2 cats, or a mix of vampires and cats against a god from Eldritch Cults.

boardgame.name: Dino-Rallye
boardgame.description:
Oh no, the Spinosaurus attacks! It's your mission to help the Colby brothers, who want to safe the other, peace-loving dinosaurs and bring them to their shelter. And don't forget to rescue the Colby brothers, too. The final task to win, is to put the safety fence into action. Players act in a cooperative way to achieve this, all together win or lose.

The game is driven by dice rolling mechanics. Depending on the dice roll, you have to move either the Spinosaurus or one of the Colby brothers. Each of the brothers has to move once, before they may move again. On their way back and forth they collect Dinosaurs and put them into their trailer, bringing them to the shelter. The Spinosaurus always moves towards the shelter. If the Spinosaurus reaches the shelter before this, you fail.

boardgame.name: The Lay Of Our Land
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

The Lay Of Our Land is a solo journaling game about the ephemeral things in life and in the world. In this game you will play as the map, an object that will be changed by geography, politics and people through the actions of different cartographers over time.

boardgame.name: クリスタルテイキング (Crystal Taking)
boardgame.description:
Crystal Taking is a trick-taking game. Players take turns playing cards to tricks in hopes of winning or losing tricks.

The game uses 56 minor arcana card, and 22 major. Minor arcana cards can be played right-side up to predict a victory or upside-down to predict defeat. The major arcana cards determine the rules for the round. There are typically three rule cards in play. You can pay VPs to put a new one from your hand into play (they each have 2 orientations also); the rules work as a conveyor, so when you add a new one, the oldest is removed.

After a certain number of rounds the game ends, leaving the player with the most points as the winner.

boardgame.name: Spiralchain: Foreverot
boardgame.description:
SpiralChain: Foreverot is a fully cooperative board game based on the SpiralChain novels by Jeremiah L. Schwennen. Between one and eight players work together to defeat the Foreverot before it can unleash untold suffering upon the Spiral of Worlds. The players win or lose as one--there are no victory points to tally or secret agendas to work towards.

Each player will have a Role Card that gives them special abilities to aid in their efforts, and each world has a limited number of enigmatic guardian dragons that might be employed to help fend off Warlords and Obliviates.

Players will travel from world to world gathering resources and making occasional forays into Nur to discard Rot Tokens until all eight of those tokens have been discarded and the heroes emerge victorious. But things are never quite that easy, are they? Gathering resources is made more difficult by the presence of maniacal Warlords that seek to destroy key locations on each world and malevolent Obliviates--scouts for the Foreverot--that block the heroes' efforts wherever they can. The same resources that are used to stop the Rot must also be used to vanquish Warlords and Obliviates, making for tough choices in each and every round of play. And the clock is always against you.

At the end of each round of play, the current First Player will roll a die in a grim responsibility we call the Foreverot Roll. This die will determine whether or not the Rot advances in its own schemes, wreaking havoc across the game. If those schemes advance too far--if all of the Foreverot Cards on Nur are played--the Rot will win. But even if the die roll is kind and a new Foreverot Card is not played, damage will be visited upon worlds and Warlords will continue in their inexorable march, bringing ruin to whatever lies in their path.

In about an hour, the fate of the 8 worlds can be decided... but in the quest to forge the Spiralchain, almost anything can happen!

boardgame.name: Key Enigma: Kalinasu Adventure
boardgame.description:
A coin from a legendary treasure has just appeared, proving that it is not a myth and only you can find it.

There were a lot of temples dedicated to worship the sun, but there was a special one from the Kalinasu civilization that worshiped the moon and housed a treasure full of coins made with a special metal that fell from the sky during the full moon. This is known as "The Treasure of Moon Gold", and a single piece of it would be worth millions. Your role will be to lead the search for the legendary treasure that was thought to be only a legend until a Professor found proof of its existence and a way to find it.

But you're not the only one who wants to get your hands on the treasure. An unknown group is chasing the professor and she has had no choice but to hide and flee, for that reason she has sent you, the best treasure hunter, everything you need to find the hidden temple where the legendary treasure awaits.

In this journey you will not be alone, the teacher's faithful assistant will accompany you wherever you need: in the heart of the jungle, in the middle of a desert or in the depths of the sea. He will always be ready to lend you a hand and get you out of trouble, although due to his clumsiness and his forgetfulness, it is likely

The adventure will be divided into 4 chapters. Each one will take place in a different part of the world with a totally different objective and tests that can be completed in an hour, like a traditional Escape Room. You can play them all at once or manage them in different days.

boardgame.name: Gif It To Me
boardgame.description:
Gif It To Me is a comedic adult party game where 3-10 players use caption cards to react to popular GIFs displayed on a smartphone using a free app.

One player is the judge and picks a GIF from the app. Everyone else picks the funniest caption card from their hand to pair with the GIF and passes it face down to the judge. The judge reads the caption cards aloud and selects their favorite. Whoever’s caption card is selected by the judge wins the round and scores one point.

The game ends when the bossiest person in the room says it ends. It's recommended to assert dominance early on so you can end the game once you are winning.

Advanced play options include keeping your hand fresh by using action cards to add a twist to basic gameplay or mixing in mature cards for extra spicy humor.

boardgame.name: Primordials: Fireborn
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.





Primordials: FireBorn is an indie project being developed by Toybox Games Studios. A young phoenix named ‘Ash’ wakes up with no recollection of who he is. He embarks on a journey trying to rediscover the secrets of his forgotten past. Along their journey the player will encounter unforgettable characters that are just as weird and wonderful as the world they live in. Some of these characters will impart invaluable skills and knowledge to take on this adventure, others will do everything in their power to stop you.The project is a third person action adventure game with platforming mechanics. It focuses on captivating story telling through a beautiful game world that entices players into exploration. Through exploration the player will begin to uncover a greater mystery about the world Ash inhabits. Players will have a diverse range of combat and platforming mechanics used to swiftly traverse the world, taking what feels familiar and giving it a fresh twist. Ash’s unique physiology gives way to a game mechanic that can change the tide of battle in an unexpected way. In short FireBorn brings epic storytelling and fun gameplay into one unforgettable experience.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Origami Ninja Star
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.





Origami Ninja Star is a chaotic hybrid of fast paced action and physics-based combat where YOU are the weapon. Slice into a colourful paper world where everyone is folded differently, and your destiny is to destroy everyone in your way. As the self-appointed protector of your village, use your unfolding technique to switch between a nimble paper ball and a deadly ninja star. Harness momentum as the Ball to traverse and ricochet through levels, then unleash it as the Star to strike enemies with precision.Born in a peaceful origami village, play as a young star determined to create new enemies and tear them apart to prove himself the greatest Origami Ninja Star. Explore the world to find and fight neighbouring clans for the sake of your village. Gain new abilities, hone your combat skills, and upgrade your gear.

You are the weapon
Slice through your foes swiftly with fluid momentum-based combat. String together a deadly combination of rebounds, wall-climbs and shuriken strikes, with an arsenal of unique sword powers to unleash on your enemies.

Unique origami world
Enjoy every fold and scrunch of the paper world, each element inspired by real life origami art. Explore different regions ranging from the woods, the clan dojos, and the city streets of the music district.

Become the greatest
During your epic journey to prove yourself, interact and occasionally destroy quirky characters and clans, each with their distinct quests and challenges. Help your own villagers through side-quests and discover new outfits, sword powers, and upgrades to your abilities.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: The Moment you were Born
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

Experience your impact on the universal balance act of everyday's life!

The Moment You Were Born is a very personal journaling experience. You will recall the stories you hear about your own birth and will explore the universal balance between light and dark.

The Moment You Were Born is a solo journaling experience, that means you interact with the text by yourself writing down your thoughts based on prompts provided in this book.

boardgame.name: The Story of a Story
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

You are a story. You were born round a fire. You are passed around and around. Your creator becomes a Teller, and they pass you to assorted listeners, some of whom grow to become their own Tellers of you. You provide warmth sometimes, and cold comforts on other occasions. You will change, you will be changed, you will rest and eventually you will flee one mouth and become a story in a different world. Will you be happy? This remains, this remains to be seen.

boardgame.name: Mettle to the Petal
boardgame.description:
The root idea is simple: you’ve been dealt quite a handful, and your task is to empty your hand before your opponents do, matching the card atop the discard pile in face value or color. (Play one card per turn, and do what it says!)

Will you be the first person to play your last card? Be alert, because every card has stipulations, and the strategy increases with each expansion set of the game.

You’ll need your wits sharp and your attention undistracted, if you are to win. Good luck.

boardgame.name: The Binding of Isaac: Four Souls – 4-player mat
boardgame.description:
Wooden chest style 4 player Game mat.

Divided into 2 parts (24"x24") for 2 players or up to 4 with both.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: The Binding of Isaac: Four Souls

boardgame.name: Fuzzy Mage Fight: Allies Pack
boardgame.description:
The allies pack includes 6 jumbo size ally cards and 7 new fuzzy mages. An ally is chosen by each mage at the beginning of the game to aid them in their quest. Allies have special abilities such as adding more attack power, slowing down opponents mineons, and forcing opponents to discard cards. Beware, however, as some of them require payment for their friendship.

Allies: Four-winged owl, Raccoon Mafia, Hired Muscle, Skunk Squad, Possum Posse, Jerry

Mages: Tag mage, Yesh mage, Rugged mage, Drabhu mage, Falala mage, Septimus mage, Niú Gá Táng mage

boardgame.name: Fuzzy Mage Fight: Silver Fox Pack
boardgame.description: Silver is based on the artist of fuzzy mage fight. Like the mage hunters, Silver has his own item cards and even a personal mineon that aid him in his quest.

boardgame.name: Fuzzy Mage Fight: Mage Hunter Pack
boardgame.description:
The mage hunters are fuzzy animals that have no magical powers but wield unique weapons that aid them in their desire to be the most "magical" fuzzy mage in the land!

Each mage hunter has 3 item cards that are played in the battlefield that offer epic abilities for fighting against the fuzzy mages.

Mage Hunters: Kiki Hunter, Wraggles Hunter

boardgame.name: Julii
boardgame.description:
Julii is a game where you navigate the political intrigues of republican Rome as the head of one of four prominent families, the Julii, the Cornelii, the Sempronii and the Claudii.

These families are made up of senators, statesmen, and other members of Rome’s elite governing class who share the same gentes, that is claim descent from a common ancestor, and the same ambition: to rule the Roman Republic.

The objective of the game is to gain political supremacy over rival families. Ultimately, the family with the most social status, wealth, popularity, and provincial control is declared the winner. To gain supremacy you must ensure that statesmen affiliated with your family wage successful military campaigns, govern prosperous provinces, control key industries, and implement effective political reforms.

Julii is a 2-4 player game that starts in 264 BC at the outbreak of the 1st Punic War and ends with the turmoil and civil wars of the late 1st Century BC. A full game is played over 10 turns, with each turn representing approximately 20-25 years. Several scenarios are included introducing shorter game duration and modified winning conditions.

boardgame.name: Dreams of Desire: Definitive Edition
boardgame.description:
This is a story about power, lust and corruption with a mystery to solve!
You play as the so called Main Character, a young guy living in a small town.

Due to unfortunate circumstances, it looks like he is forced to go to military school.
Our hero however, has other ideas. He never wanted to be a soldier. As things start to look inevitable, he stumbles upon an old book about the ways of the mind.
With the help of newfound knowledge he can change the course of his life. But how will he do it, and what's the price he has to pay?

List of fetishes in Dreams of Desire:

Corruption
MILF
Anal
Voyeur
Feet
Teen
Mind Control
Harem
Sleep
Light BDSM


Source: The Developer Website.

What you're getting in the Definitive Edition:
- Episode 1-12
- The Lost Memories DLC (3 Chapters)
- The Holiday Special DLC
- Dozens of Extra Scenes

Features:
- Over 5000 images
- Over 460 animations
- 37 Steam Achievements
- Scene and Extras Gallery
- Sandbox-style minigame
- 7 different endings
- Multiple paths with characters creating many different playthroughs

boardgame.name: Was ist Was: Junior – Ritter
boardgame.description: In the children's game for ages 4 and up, the players choose their medieval knight figure, each from a different era. The cards with the images of heads, bodies, legs, and arms lie face down in the center. Now the fun begins! What number does the die show? Is there a matching part for your own knight? If not, just give it to another player. The first player to finish the puzzle has won. But be careful! A robber baron has mingled with the knights in this exciting educational game. If the knight is completed first, everyone has lost together in this children's game.

boardgame.name: Voyagers
boardgame.description:
Voyagers is a pre-progammable race game where you step in the footsteps of famous voyagers. It is your goal to (re-) discover the marvels of the world, while being sabotaged by your competitors.

Initially 3 locations to be discovered are set out and every player needs to try to become the first voyager discovering these sights. Every turn 5 navigation cards are chosen and put in a 5 step program, which needs to be programmed upfront. Once the program is executed step by step, you need to set out course to these discoveries and avoid being sabotaged.

After the fourth discovery is done, every player gets its own secret discovery card and once the first player has discovered this last secret discovery the game ends. The player with most discovery points wins the game.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Akademia Superbohaterów
boardgame.description:
This game (which could be translated to "Superhero Academy") is about Polish scientist that made a great impact in the history of science.

The game consist of 30 cards with a different scientist on each card. On a player's turn they draw a card from the pile and ask other players questions (which are actually clues) about the scientist (the questions are presented on the cards). The first player to guess which scientist the question(s) refer(s) to score 1-3 points depending on how many clue-questions they needed (more clues - less points).

The game ends when there are no cards in the pile and the player who scored the most points is the winner.

—user summary

Akademia Superbohaterów to fascynująca rozgyrwka, która pozwala odkryć znanych i nieznanych polskich bohaterów.

Gra karciana w formie quizu. Przeznaczona jest dla minimum dwóch graczy w wieku od 7 lat (gracze muszą umieć czytać). Jej celem jest zgromadzenie jak największej liczby punktów.

Punkty są przyznawane za wiedzę o największych polskich naukowacach, a także za refleks.

—description from the back of the box

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: The Longest Trench: Expansion
boardgame.description:
This is an Expansion to The Longets Trench funded by a Kickstarter Campaign. It consists of a Battleboard and 10 Minicards delivered in a Ziplockbag.

The Battleboard facilitate the battles due to a better overview for the players. The Minicards add some variations to the existing battles.

boardgame.name: Yortuk
boardgame.description:
Based on the second Jabari book, it is a card game where you must capture monsters by making pairs.

Each turn the active player must draw a card from another player, in case of making a pair, he must play it, each monster has a power and a value. Resolves the power and passes the turn.

The game ends when a player begins their turn with no cards in hand, and each player will score the value of each monster in their play area minus the points of the pairs they have in hand.
whoever has the most points wins.

boardgame.name: OnlyFab Simulator
boardgame.description:
User Summary

A simple 'casual clicker adult game'. Your protagonist works in the online adult industry and you're trying to make her more successful, by clicking and after some time by hiring managers to help clicking and analyzing the fan base.

According to the publisher the game features incredible clicker mechanics, a beautiful female main character and awesome 3D animations & art, though the reviews suggest it's just 'cookie clicker but porn', the female character has 'weird nipples' and the awesome animations are basically limited to 10 seconds and under, and looped.

boardgame.name: Brako
boardgame.description:
Based on the novel "Dog Mystery", a group of puppies have to stop BRAKO, an android dog who wants to usurp the role of animal death.

A board is built with tiles (5x5 for 2-3 players, or 6x6 for 4-5 players) where the skeletons of animals killed by BRAKO will be hidden.

The pups have 2 actions to perform each turn, they must choose between moving by rolling 1d6, removing a stone from the terrain, digging in a clear terrain. Resolve an event card and end turn.

BRAKO moves when events dictate, if he manages to completely damage a pup and they don't have a bone to heal it, the cubs loses.

If the pups manage to unearth the animal skeletons (4 in a 2-3 player game and 8 in a 4-5 player game) they will stop BRAKO and win the game.

boardgame.name: La Rata Ricarda
boardgame.description:
Based on the novel of the same name.
The Mice are trapped in the sewers under the serpentarium, and must escape by rescuing as many mice as possible, but among them there is a traitor, if the traitor leaves the first, he will close the exit trapping them.

Each turn the active player take a tile and place it as part of the sewer, can move up to 2 spaces and resolve an event card.

The tiles allow you to draw item cards or rescue mice.
the events will indicate when to remove the sewer covers, when the 4th is removing, the mice will be able to get out.

If the traitor mouse comes out first, he wins.
If at least 1 brave mouse manages to leave before, when the traitor mouse leaves, the rescued mice will be counted on each side and the one with the most will win.

boardgame.name: Solitaire Legends: Guinevere
boardgame.description:
Camelot hast fallen into darkness. Four magic runes art missing from Merlin's aerie atop Castle Camelot. Alas, a most powerful curse hast bewitched King Arthur and his court. Queen Guinevere must wield Excalibur, battle the corrupted Knights of the Round Table, and destroy the runes to breaketh the spell.

Guinevere is a solitaire game that can be played with a traditional deck of cards. The game was created by Jonathan Auffarth in 2021. In the game, there are twelve piles of cards arranged in a circle with the draw deck in the center. The object of the game is to find and destroy 4 cursed runes (Aces) while avoiding 4 corrupted Knights (Jacks). To do so, you must destroy the faceup top cards with matching value cards in your hand to reveal the hidden cards underneath. But make haste, when the draw deck runs out the game is over!

—description from the designer
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Theme: King Arthur / The Knights of the Round Table / Camelot

boardgame.name: Flippity Frog
boardgame.description:
First player to return 4 Froglets safely home wins!

Mummy frog must successfully carry her Froglets on her back across the pond, leaping from lilypad to lilypad. Each lilypad is turned over to reveal the next step mummy frog can take.

If you come across Big Bad Fish it’s the end of your go! Or, take a Super Jump home!

Mummy frog must flip over four lilypads to safely cross the pond!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Whose Nest?
boardgame.description:
Crafty Croc has stolen all the eggs! Luckily, we have his swag bag. Can you return all the eggs to their correct nests?

Roll the dice! If you roll an egg, take the egg and place it in a nest. Will it hatch as a Chick or a Croc? If a chick, take a token...if a Croc, oh no! put the egg back in the bag.

Each player after their go, spins the nest! Can you remember where the croc hatched?

The first player to return all 3 baby chicks to the nest wins!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Silly Sounds
boardgame.description:
Silly Sounds is the new family-fun party game where everyone gets to make and guess the silly sound stuck on their headband!

The sound could be ‘An elephant asleep on a train’ or ‘A baby playing the bagpipes’! The only thing you do know… it will be very silly.

Spin and pick a player to make the sound, but land on ‘All Play’ and everyone makes the silly sound and all at the same time… it’s total mayhem!

Just beat the timer, guess the sound and the card is yours. Collect 3 cards to win the game, but watch out for the mute rounds where you mustn’t make a sound and can only act it out!

Making silly sounds is only half the fun, guessing them is the other half! Silly Sounds, the game you play with your ears!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Battletech: Touring the Stars – Rocky
boardgame.description:
Once a cool, but beautiful world, rich in natural resources, Rocky led a charmed existence as one of the first planets colonized by humankind. As a paradise settled by some of Terra's wealthiest citizens, its people wanted for little, and strife was rare for centuries. But like the Hegemony it belonged to, Rocky fell to the darkness of the Amaris years, and saw its killing blows come in the form of a rare battle between Houses Steiner and Davion at the dawn of the Succession Wars. Now little more than another ruined casualty of human avarice, Rocky is little remembered by the Inner Sphere at large"”save for the rumors of stolen treasures of the Star League, lost beneath its frozen wastes.

Touring the Stars volumes consist of a color cover depicting an orbital view of the subject planet, a short history section, a small number of RPG tracks tailored to the planet, a rules annex detailing optional rules for games and scenarios set on the planet, a color world map and a hexed Battleforce 2 map. Each volume averages between 15 and 19 pages in total.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
BattleTech: A Time of War – The BattleTech RPG

boardgame.name: Marvel: Eye Found It!
boardgame.description: Search for hundreds of hidden illustrations in the Marvel Universe in Marvel: Eye Found It! while visiting Wakanda, Asgard, and everywhere in between on a large game board with your favorite Marvel characters.

boardgame.name: The Wizard of Oz Adventure Book Game
boardgame.description: In The Wizard of Oz Adventure Book Game, players work together to complete challenges and turn the pages of a unique game board book that allows you to relive the magic of The Wizard of Oz.
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: The Princess Bride Adventure Book Game

listing.notes: Brand new, in shrink wrap. Ships right away from 20814. Buyer pays exact shipping cost. Combine with other games I am selling for discounted shipping. Ships in U.S. only.

boardgame.name: Marvel Champions: Das Kartenspiel – Helden-Pack Ironheart
Marvel Champions: El Juego de Cartas – Ironheart Pack de Héroe
Marvel Champions: Il Gioco di Carte – Ironheart: Pack Eroe
Marvel Champions: Le Jeu De Cartes – Ironheart
Marvel Champions: The Card Game – Ironheart Hero Pack
boardgame.description:
After a senseless act of violence took the life of her best friend and of her stepfather, Riri Williams used her supergenius intellect to reverse-engineer Tony Stark’s Iron Man design and create her very own power armor. Now she soars the skies as Ironheart, determined to rid the world of cruel fates like the one she once endured.

This high-tech hero boosts into battle in this expansion pack, which introduces Ironheart as a new playable hero along with her fifteen signature cards. With a pre-built Leadership deck ready to play from the get-go, you’ll be able to face down villains with Ironheart’s arsenal of armors from the moment you open the box. With the unique ability to gradually and permanently “level up” her armor for the rest of the scenario, Ironheart is a fantastic hero who can put in serious work for any team.

-description from publisher
